dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S991 IS: To amend the Small Business Act to eliminate certain requirements relating to the award of construction subcontracts within the county or State of performance.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Sullivan (for himself, Ms. Murkowski, and Ms. Hirono) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to eliminate certain requirements relating to the award of construction subcontracts within the county or State of performance.

section.header: Elimination of requirement relating to award of construction subcontracts within county or State of performance
section.text: Paragraph (11) of section 8(a) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 637(a)) is repealed.
